General.Name: New Advanced Electronics Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: New Advanced Electronics Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of speakers, portable power supply, and related power supply products in the United States, Asia, and Europe. Its products include subwoofers; tower, shelf, outdoor, center-channel, and wall-mounted speakers; and home theater systems, as well as related parts and accessories. The company was formerly known as Samya Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to New Advanced Electronics Technologies Co., Ltd. in November 2018. New Advanced Electronics Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
